basics.name: Sajratul Yakin Rubaiat
basics.label: PhD Student in Computer Science, Specializing in Large Language Models and Databases
basics.summary: A dedicated Research Fellow with a strong interest in fundamental Large Language Models and their potential applications in fields like biology. I have good experience in machine learning, software engineering, and data analysis. Currently pursuing a PhD in Computer Science at the University of Idaho, where I am actively contributing to research in pneumonia detection and early diabetes prediction.

work.name: Enosis Solutions
highlights: Optimized Communication Center with synchronization and data persistence.
Led campaign automation with SMS/email workflows and dynamic opt-outs.
Resolved complex bugs, fixing asynchronous handling and race conditions.
Managed database migrations, ensuring seamless evolution and performance.
Revamped UI/UX across platforms for cross-device compatibility.
Improved API performance, reducing latency in high-traffic applications.
Implemented role-based access control, enhancing security.
Integrated MMS capabilities, managing media lifecycle.
Developed test automation frameworks and conducted regression testing.
Led cross-functional teams, collaborating globally on feature development.
Implemented push notifications and worked on iOS webviews.

work.name: Ankur Undergrad Research Scholarship
highlights: Collected a dataset of over 140 patient records for pneumonia detection, validated by three different doctors.
Developed web-based medical software for pneumonia detection, enabling users to upload mobile-captured X-ray images and receive pneumonia predictions.
Created and analyzed a custom Residual Attention Network model for pneumonia detection, outperforming existing models.
Studied and implemented various models for early diabetes prediction, demonstrating the effectiveness of data recovery with MLP over K-means-based noise reduction with different classifiers.

work.name: Computer Science Department, University of Idaho
highlights: Assisting in undergraduate computer science courses.
Conducting lab sessions and providing academic support to students.
Collaborating with faculty on curriculum development.

publications.name: Online Digital Investigative Journalism using SociaLens
publications.publisher: 26th International Conference on Information Integration and Web Intelligence (IIWAS)
publications.summary: Presented research on leveraging SociaLens for enhancing digital investigative journalism.

publications.name: Bangladesh Rape Cases Metadata
publications.summary: Metadata files extracted from newspapers using LLM to analyze rape cases in Bangladesh.

publications.name: Rape Cases with Legal Codes
publications.summary: Comprehensive dataset of rape cases in Bangladesh annotated with legal codes.

publications.name: Bangladesh Weather Dataset (1901 - 2023)
publications.summary: Historical weather data from Bangladesh spanning over a century.

publications.name: Design Recommendations for a Smartphone-based Point-of-Care Tool: Analyzing Context and Implications for Use in Rural Bangladesh
publications.summary: Analyzed the context and implications of using smartphone-based point-of-care tools in rural Bangladesh.

publications.name: Pneumonia Detection Using Deep Transfer Learning in Gender Specific Chest X-ray Images
publications.publisher: 2021 International Conference on Electronics, Communications and Information Technology (ICECIT)
publications.summary: Developed a deep transfer learning model for pneumonia detection tailored to gender-specific chest X-ray images.

publications.name: Efficacy of Transfer Learning Models in Pneumonia Detection with Scarce Local Healthcare Data
publications.publisher: The 12th International Conference on Electrical and Computer Engineering (ICECE)
publications.summary: Evaluated the effectiveness of various transfer learning models for pneumonia detection using limited local healthcare data.

publications.name: Important Feature Selection & Accuracy Comparisons of Different Machine Learning Models for Early Diabetes Detection
publications.publisher: 2018 International Conference on Innovation in Engineering and Technology (ICIET)
publications.summary: Compared feature selection methods and machine learning models to enhance early diabetes detection accuracy.

projects.name: Bangladesh Law LLM
projects.description: Developed a complete dataset of Bangladesh law for every year and section, along with a retrieval system enabling users to query legal information with references.

projects.name: Weather Time Series Data Analysis and Prediction
projects.description: Analyzed 50 years of weather data from Bangladesh to develop a time series model predicting future temperatures, rainfall, and runoff.

projects.name: Newspaper Data Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed newspaper articles to assess the prevalence and circumstances of road accidents and rape cases across Bangladesh.

projects.name: Different Type of Fruit Classification
projects.description: Developed real-time software using Python to detect and sort different types of fruit into designated categories or boxes.

projects.name: 3 Lead ECG
projects.description: Designed and developed a 3 Lead ECG system using Java capable of measuring a person's electrocardiogram and providing valuable heart health information.

projects.name: Online MCQ Exam System
projects.description: Created an online multiple-choice exam system using PHP, facilitating remote assessments and automated grading.

awards.title: Microsoft Malware Detection Challenge
awards.summary: Achieved Top 10% ranking in the Microsoft Malware Detection Challenge.

awards.title: Catch me if you can (User identity detection)
awards.summary: Secured Top 5% position in the Catch me if you can User Identity Detection competition.

awards.title: RSNA Pneumonia Detection Challenge
awards.summary: Ranked in the Top 13% for the RSNA Pneumonia Detection Challenge.

awards.title: ACM ICPC Dhaka Regional (Onsite)
awards.summary: Participated in ACM ICPC Dhaka Regional competitions across 2016, 2017, and 2018.

volunteer.summary: Conducted beginner and intermediate programming sessions.
